description:
A great option for long days in the mountains. Soft uppers balance durability and comfort, and a gusset-free tongue ensures no shifting or movement while walking. A low-profile midsole and outsole lets you edge or smear while scrambling, and the heel offers hybrid-crampon compatibility when crossing the snowline.

  • GORE-TEX Performance Comfort ® liners assure waterproofness and breathability
  • 3-D flex ankle pivots allow a wide range of motion and are excellent for technical moves
  • To-the-toe lacing for precise fitting
  • Polyurethane midsoles with PU-Skin inserts for shock absorption
  • TPU insert at heel for crampon compatibility
  • Vibram® Cube sole with Impact Brake system lugs for traction in loose terrain
name: La Sportiva Trango Tech Leather Gore-Tex Mountaineering Boots - Men's
